data.name: Blue And Black
Black Web
data.description:
Banish white backgrounds!
This simple style inverts the brightness on most web pages through Google Chrome browser
Turns black on white to white on black, but unlike Google's High Contrast extension, this keeps other colour shades more compatible with the originals. For example, links that were dark blue on white become light blue on black.
Try it and save your eyesight!

data.name: Deku and Bakugo
＠ライブドアブログ lite (スマートフォン/タブレット)
data.description: ライブドアブログのスマホ用ページ軽量化
data.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("blog.livedoor.jp"), domain("doorblog.jp"), domain("ldblog.jp"), domain("dreamlog.jp"), domain("publog.jp"), domain("livedoor.biz"), domain("diary.to"), domain("weblog.to"), domain("bloggeek.jp"), domain("blogism.jp"), domain("blogo.jp"), domain("blogstation.jp"), domain("blogto.jp"), domain("gger.jp"), domain("golog.jp"), domain("liblo.jp"), domain("myjournal.jp"), domain("mynikki.jp"), domain("xxxblog.jp"), domain("youblog.jp"), domain("2chblog.jp"), domain("blog.jp"), domain("teamblog.jp"), domain("corpblog.jp"), domain("officeblog.jp"), domain("storeblog.jp"), domain("cafeblog.jp"), domain("officialblog.jp"), domain("techblog.jp"), domain("comment.blogcms.jp"), regexp(".*\\.(jp|com|net|org|info|biz|name)/archives/[0-9]{4,16}\\.html.*"), regexp(".*\\.(jp|com|net|org|info|biz|name)/archives/[0-9]{4,16}"), regexp(".*/lite/archives/[0-9]{4,16}\\.html.*"), regexp(".*/lite/archives/[0-9]{4,16}/comments/[0-9]{1,16}/.*"), regexp(".*/lite/article/[0-9]{4,16}/image/[0-9]{1,16}") {
  div.blogreader-link,
  div#article-clap,
  div#category_ranking,
  div#pbp_ranking,
  div#blog_news,
  div#attention_ranking,
  div#recommend_by_genre,
  div#instagram_blogger,
  div#blog_ranking,
  div#matome_category,
  div[id*="ldblog_related_articles_"],
  div.blogreader-link.blogreader-link-none.box-border,
  aside.section-box,
  div.footer-external-links.footer-box,
  aside.footer-blog-banner.footer-box,
  div.footer-bottom,
  div.snsshare-ttl,
  div.snsshare,
  a.follow_box,
  div#e-likebox,

/* Individual */
  a[title="Amazon"] img.pict,
  div[class*="amazlet"],
  div[class*="amaquick"],
  a[href*="www.dlsite.com"],
  div.amazon.LargeImage,
  table[style=" border-style: none; width:300px;"][cellspacing="0"][cellpadding="0"][border="0"] tbody tr[style="border-style:none;"],
  div#ld-floating-menu,
  img[src*="amazon-adsystem.com"],
  a[href*="linkCode="],
  div.amachazl-box,
  ul.related,
  div.__uz__widget,
  div#_popIn_recommend,
  div.gn_inline_exp,
  span[id*=banner-]
  {
    display: none !important;
  }
}

@-moz-document regexp(".*/lite/archives/[0-9]{4,16}/comments/[0-9]{1,16}/.*") {
/* Comments */
  aside.section-box
  {
    display: inline !important;
  }
}

data.name: TwitLonger Twitter Dark
IMDb fullscreen imageviewer
data.description:
This stylesheet removes dead space around the image. Note that even if your adblocker hides the space used by the ads (the "dead" space at the top of the screen in the screenshot), it doesn't make the image use the whole space. This stylesheet does. After installing the style, reload the page or exit the mediaviewer page if it's the current page. Update 2020-07-06: IMDb is implementing a new design. Depending on your cookies, you are given one of the 2 layouts.
The stylesheet has been updated for the new design: hiding the header (menu and search field) and the footer of the page and recovering the space used by the top bar (back button and # of image). The top bar will stay visible all the time. Use the userscript version to hide it. For more styles, userscripts, tips, ..., go to my programming page
